AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND status = #{status}
ORDER BY create_time DESC

mapper.select: SELECT s.name, COUNT(ro.id) AS value FROM station s LEFT JOIN ride_order ro ON s.id = ro.start_station_id GROUP BY s.id, s.name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10
